Name: Bistro Sidecar
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Although significantly twisted from the classic, this is still recognisably a Sidecar in style.
History: Adapted from a recipe by chef Kathy Casey Food Studios, Seattle, USA. Kathy's original recipe called for a sugar rim and tangerine juice. See our Sidecar cocktail page for the full story behind the origins of the Sidecar, its history and variations .
Nutrition: One serving of Bistro Sidecar contains 183 calories
